articles.title: See what Shanghai looks like as coronavirus fears linger
articles.description: CNN's David Culver visits Shanghai, China, where streets are mostly empty and businesses shuttered as fears of the novel coronavirus linger. The virus has infected more than 73,000 people around the world, mostly in mainland China.
